column3: “Very gorgeous dark purple buds that smell strongly of orange juice. The taste is very sweet and is also reminiscent of oranges with a floral undertone. Produces a very nice head high that keeps you feeling alert and aware. This is probably one of my favorite strains.”

“This Phat Panda joint was the best weed i have ever tasted. I use medically and daily and this was by far the best weed i have ever had. I need and eight ASAP. Had the amazing Tangie flavor with that hint of earthy and sweet from the GSC. 10/10 would recommend to anyone.”
“Amazingly orange citrus smell and taste with a hint of earthly/floral.”
“Smell was there, but the bud was ultra-dry. it was produced by Phat Panda... no wonder!”
“Tastes just like sweet oranges, first time I ever smoked legal weed 😂 my fav!”
“Definitely my favorite. Great focus and energy. Beautiful flowers. Taste is amazing.🔥🔥🔥🔥”

“The first thing you notice is the aroma (after lit). To me it smelled a lot live Windex or a similar kitchen cleaner. The effects are very cerebral meaning you will be on task; it might not be the right task but you'll be on it! It's reasonably effective as a pain reliever but that's on the low end.”
“my new favorite! pretty purple and smells and tastes like oranges!”
